c1.name: Bringer of Blessing
c1.descriptionRaw: When the Suanni Man Chai from <color=#FFD780FF>Suanni's Gilded Dance</color> meets back up with Gaming, it will heal 15% of Gaming's HP.
c1.description: When the Suanni Man Chai from Suanni's Gilded Dance meets back up with Gaming, it will heal 15% of Gaming's HP.

c2.name: Plum Blossoms Underfoot
c2.descriptionRaw: When Gaming receives healing and this instance of healing overflows, his ATK will be increased by 20% for 5s.
c2.description: When Gaming receives healing and this instance of healing overflows, his ATK will be increased by 20% for 5s.

c3.name: Awakening Spirit
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Bestial Ascent</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Bestial Ascent by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Soar Across Mountains
c4.descriptionRaw: When <color=#FFD780FF>Bestial Ascent</color>'s Plunging Attack: Charmed Cloudstrider hits an opponent, it will restore 2 Energy to Gaming. This effect can be triggered once every 0.2s.
c4.description: When Bestial Ascent's Plunging Attack: Charmed Cloudstrider hits an opponent, it will restore 2 Energy to Gaming. This effect can be triggered once every 0.2s.

c5.name: Evil-Daunting Roar
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Suanni's Gilded Dance</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Suanni's Gilded Dance by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: To Tame All Beasts
c6.descriptionRaw: <color=#FFD780FF>Bestial Ascent</color>'s Plunging Attack: Charmed Cloudstrider CRIT Rate increased by 20% and CRIT DMG increased by 40%, and its attack radius will be increased.
c6.description: Bestial Ascent's Plunging Attack: Charmed Cloudstrider CRIT Rate increased by 20% and CRIT DMG increased by 40%, and its attack radius will be increased.
